system.effect: With a sharp cracking noise, several of the tiny bones in the target's foot snap like twigs. The target suffers 2 levels of Fatigue, and his Movement is halved (rounded up) until he receives medical attention. He must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer the Lost Foot condition (see page 243).
